Posts.Content: Well done you. Just 7 more rad for me then it will be me shouting from the roof tops! xxx
Posts.Title: Last radiotherapy session done and ticked off - yay!

Posts.Content: Thanks Helen and Andrea, I am feeling better this morning but it always just before bed I seem to panic. Â I too sometimes ask myself if this is really happening. Â I dont think I will truely believe it until treatment starts. Â Although seeing the bruise appear on the outside of my breast has certainly made it more real. Like you say once I have a treatment plan/full diagnosis hopefully I will begin to feel more in control. Â Things just are not happening as quickly as I would like them too which I find really frustrating. love and hugs to everyone xxx
Posts.Title: panic attacks

Posts.Content: Hi Ali, Â  Just wanted to send you lots of hugs xxx
Posts.Title: re occurance

Posts.Content: Still waiting for treatment plan and full diagnosis. Can now see a small bruise on the outside of my breast where the lump sticks out. Most nights have a panic attack before bed. Headach shivers and sweaty palms. Panic I will die in my sleep. Its so stupid I know. Will get a phone call on Friday with the stage of my cancer. Hopefully things will start moving again. Sorry for moaning about all this. I know we are all in the same boat.
Posts.Title: panic attacks

Posts.Content: Hi, I started chemo on Tuesday this week. Wednesday night for me was like a really bad hangover. Tuesday like a normal hangover and today just a bit tired. With me this is the start of the treatment, surgery should be next then radio and hormonal treatment. It's a long road and I think we just have to take it one day at a time. Big hugs to all xxx
Posts.Title: Starting chemo in 11 days.....

Posts.Content: Have have exactly the same question. By boob feels so different now. Finished radio yesterday so now thinking of the future. I guess everyone feels vulnerable after treatment is finished xxx
Posts.Title: How are you supposed to know

Posts.Content: Thanks for all of the support and advise. treatment done and follow up appointment booked for end of June. Can't remember when I have gone without a hospital visit for that long. ..Feels kind of strange.......
Posts.Title: Last radiotherapy tomorrow!

Posts.Content: Â Hi all, Â  Just wanted to share with everyone it's my last of 23 radio sessions tomorrow. Can't believe this journey is hopefully nearly over. Â Quite sore Boob and under the arm. Also bad sore thoart and tight chest. Anyone else had this during/after radio? Been on tamoxifen for about two and half months now. Second prescription and they have changed the brand already. Quite a few hot flushes and headaches. Hopefully will settle down soon. Hugs to everyoneÂ  xxx Â
Posts.Title: Last radiotherapy tomorrow!

Posts.Content: Thanks Aliowl don't worry you will reach the end of your journey too just keep your eyes on the finish line xxx thanks butterfly will read about the magnets with interest! hi Amy lou as far as I know I have not had radio on the neck area. Asked the radiologist and they said I shouldn't be getting a sore thoart from it. But hay ho everyone is different after all.
Posts.Title: Last radiotherapy tomorrow!

Posts.Content: Thanks for all the great advice. It's really helps knowing you are all there. Hugs xxx
Posts.Title: hair starting to go :-(

Posts.Content: I am day 9 treat 1 FEC. Hair has started to shed. Went to the wig shop on Saturday. The NHS ones made me look like a barbie doll. The have ordered in a few more and a human hair one (not cheap) that they can colour and style as I choose. Waiting for there call sooner rather than later I hope ;-) In a way I am pleased have been so stressed about it. At least once it's gone it's gone. Another step along the road. Any wig tips/experiences welcome. Hugs xxx
Posts.Title: hair starting to go :-(

Posts.Content: Thanks everyone. only you all can understand. My friends and family are being so supportive and say I am so strong. But I am a jelly inside. Your kind words made me cry on the bus home. Really helps knowing you are all there and I am not alone with my feelings. Big hugs xxx
Posts.Title: Feeling Down

Posts.Content: Just want all this to go away. Want look like and feel and think like myself again. Feel so weak and beginning to look like a freak. Got my wig but going to have to go back to get it cut again as doesn't look like me. Moan over xxx
Posts.Title: Feeling Down

Posts.Content: Like Maggie I used the cold cap and kept 70% plus of my hair. My hair has always been dead straight... until now. Finished chemo last December Â and my hair is still curly at the bottom. It looks like I have toned it 20's style!
Posts.Title: Does anyone have curly chemo hair ?

Posts.Content: So pleased for you. Just starting my journey so its nice to here from people who have got there. Xxx
Posts.Title: I did it!! ðŸ˜œ

Posts.Content: Start tax tomorrow following 3 FEC. Had great news this week my tumour has shrunk by more than 50% which is more than I dare hope. From 18 ml to 8 ml. Scared about tomorrow but this news will help me cope hugs to everyone xxx
Posts.Title: Start Tax Tomorrow

Posts.Content: Thanks for the encouragement I am pleased yours is working too! Was quite nauseous after infusion. They gave be an injection which made me sleepy but much bettet. Just slept for a few hours s when I got home and felt much better. Feeling good this morning. Nurse is coming today to give me my bone marrow boosting injection. Not looking forward to the aches and pains but if it works it will be worth it .
Posts.Title: Start Tax Tomorrow

Posts.Content: My best friend brought we one when I was undergoing chemo, a great present! Â She got it from amazon xxx
Posts.Title: Fear & Low Moods

Posts.Content: Hi Ali, Â  I had my last chemo on 3rd Dec then my op on the 10 Jan. Â My radio started on the 23rd Feb. Â Hope that helps. Just concentrate on getting a stronger and feeling better. Â time will fly and the you will begin to feel normalish soon xxx Â  Â
Posts.Title: surgery date

Posts.Content: Welcome back Ali and good luck going back to work. I am going to Maderia on Monday and can't wait! Xxx
Posts.Title: neddys club

Posts.Content: Welcome back Ali and good luck going back to work. I am going to Maderia on Monday and can't wait! Xxx
Posts.Title: neddys club

Posts.Content: Do you get nausea on tax too or chemo brain ? Thanks xxc
Posts.Title: I'm knackered.......

Posts.Content: Hi I was just the same between FEC 2 and 3 which I had yesterday. Just didnt bounce back the same. Was hoping to work week 2 and 3 but chemo brain has put pay to working week 2. Are you on Tax next. Not looking forward to that. But at least I am half way through hugs xxx
Posts.Title: I'm knackered.......

Posts.Content: Hi Aligog, I am sure it is just a blip. I used Nioxin and it worked well for me. Merry Christmas xxxÂ
Posts.Title: Hair loss with cold cap after 11 sessions

Posts.Content: Hi all, Â  Not posted on here for a wee while. Been concentrating on getting back to normal ad I finished treatment in march. Feeling pretty good in general. Have my first follow up appointment since finishing treatment next week and it's really getting me down. I guess I have been trying to forget about it all and succeeding some of the time. The appointment is a reminder what I have been though. Obviously terrified they will find something but I guess that's normal. Â  Hugs to everyone xxx Â  Â
Posts.Title: Why am I so scared

Posts.Content: Had a terrible time having my FEC yesterday. Kept getting fainting spells so they had to stop for a while. Also got an allegic reaction. The cold cap was much worse than before. Seemed tighter and colder. Hair has thinned. But still have full covering. Considering not doing it next time we will see. On the plus side have changed my antisickness meds to emend. No sickness at all last night so hope that continues today. Hugs xxx
Posts.Title: 2nd fec day 2

Posts.Content: Feeling good this morning. Goinging to get my wig on tuesday. Its a human hair one that they are colouring and cutting for me. Its pricey but I think it will be worth it as my hair is one of my trademarks. If I really like it might just take control and get my head shaved and throw the cold cap out the window.
Posts.Title: 2nd fec day 2

Posts.Content: So pleased for you. I got the same results 4 weeks ago. Great isn't it! Xxx
Posts.Title: 1st Annual mammo clear.....I am so happy

Posts.Content: Hi Andrea, I am just diagnosised too, last thursday. Â Keep going from not believing it to I am going to die in my sleep. Round and round. Â End up with a fuzzy head and headache. My hip is hurting now so I hope that doesnt mean its spread, though they said from the ultrasound that my nodes look clear. Just so paranoid. Going to see the surgeon tomorrow to get my treatment plan but have been told its likely to be chemo, op, radio than hormonal therapy as mines oestrogen positive. I dont have children but have a wonderful supportive husband and friends. Also have three lovely cats that I am sure will keep me smiling. Â My mum died in febuary so I dont think 2014 is Â a good year for me. Â At least she want see me go through this. Supposed to be going to Turkey on holiday at the end of august, shouldnt think that will happen now. just so angry about it all. good luck with everything and keep in touch, love Sharon
Posts.Title: New Person!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Andrea, I am just diagnosised too, last thursday. Â Keep going from not believing it to I am going to die in my sleep. Round and round. Â End up with a fuzzy head and headache. My hip is hurting now so I hope that doesnt mean its spread, though they said from the ultrasound that my nodes look clear. Just so paranoid. Going to see the surgeon tomorrow to get my treatment plan but have been told its likely to be chemo, op, radio than hormonal therapy as mines oestrogen positive. I dont have children but have a wonderful supportive husband and friends. Also have three lovely cats that I am sure will keep me smiling. Supposed to be going to Turkey on holiday at the end of august, shouldnt think that will happen now. just so angry about it all. good luck with everything and keep in touch, love Sharon
Posts.Title: New Person!!!

Posts.Content: Thanks for the replies it is FEC-T
Posts.Title: treatment starts Tuesday

Posts.Content: Just found out have my pre chemo appointment on Monday then chemo starts Tuesday 9am. What should I take with me to chemo? Starting to panic a bit.
Posts.Title: treatment starts Tuesday

Posts.Content: Thanks everyone really helps to know you are all there and I am not alone. Big hugs to everyone.
Posts.Title: treatment starts Tuesday

Posts.Content: Well done snowy mum, That was me back in March seems like an age ago now. I found my Boob got hotter and redder for a few weeks after radio. It's still a bit dry even now. I think you find a new normal after all this. Â Speaking for myself it is always in the back of my mind. Still getting quite bad headaches and flushes (taking tamoxifin). But life has returned to normalish. Wishing you a speedy recovery xxx Â
Posts.Title: Finished Radiotherapy !

Posts.Content: Just wanted to share the good news from my biopsy last week. The nurse just phoned me. Started chemo Tuesday so was just the news I needed.
Posts.Title: lymph node biopsy clear

Posts.Content: Hi Toony, I am about 1 year behind you. I am just waiting to get my appointment though for January. Just dreading getting that letter! I guess it doesn't get any easier. Hope all goes well for you xxxÂ
Posts.Title: 2 Year Check Up

Posts.Content: Hi there, Â  I used the cold cap and it was very successful. My hair did thin a bit but no bald patches. Finished chemo beginning of december. Just had my hair dyed and you can't tell what I have been though. Â The cold cap is really hard for the first 10 mins or so but you get used to it. Just ask if you have and questions xxx
Posts.Title: Pre chemo check

Posts.Content: Hi all, Got my second yearly scan tomorrow. Always stirs me up a bit. Had some pain in my operated breast. GP says it's nerve damage and not to worry. But you can't help but worry can you.
Posts.Title: 2 yearly mammogram tomorroe

Posts.Content: Been to the hospital today thinking would get dates for either chemo or surgery depending on stage of cancer. They dont have that information yet. So why not phone me to save me a trip and anxiety. Will find out next friday now. Also will need CT scan that might not be for 2 or 3 weeks. Just want to get on with the treatment. Finally decided will need to cancel holiday. Going to sneak away for a few days before eveything kicks off. Sorry for the rant but so frustrated/angry/scared in equal measures Xxx
Posts.Title: Feeling Frustrated

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,Â  Not posted for a while as finished all my treatment apart from tamoxifin in march last year. Ever since having chemo I have suffered from migraine which also seem to me affected by different brands of tamoxifen. Â I have had a headache and neck pain for about a week now and it is getting worse. Finally plucked up the courage to book a doctor's appointment which is on Friday. Â So scared it's something terrible broke down in front of my husband for only the second time on this journey last night. I guess we all have these fears. Big hugs
Posts.Title: So Scared
